patterns: can you tell me a random fact ?
i want to hear a fun fact

responses: did you know? honey never spoils. archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible!
here’s a fun one: octopuses have three hearts. two pump blood to the gills, while one pumps it to the rest of the body!
a cool fact: bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t!
did you know that a day on venus is longer than a year on venus?
here’s something fun: a single strand of spider silk is five times stronger than steel of the same diameter.
